overview: When Courtney's cousin, Sammie, gets her fired from her first job as a nanny for fucking the dad, she finds another couple in need of her services, Mr. and Mrs. Pierce. But, problems soon arise when Courtney develops a crush on Mr. Pierce and thinks there night be an opportunity to take things further. So, when Mr. Pierce invites her and Sammie to move in - Courtney doesn't realize that, once again, Sammie might be fucking things up for her.
title: Naughty Nannies
